titleStmt.title: The ioyful and royal entertainment of the ryght high and mightie Prince, Frauncis the Frenche Kings only brother by the grace of God Duke of Brabande, Aniow, Aláunson, &c. Into his noble citie of Antwerpe. 1582. Translated out of Frenche by Arthur Golding, according to the copie printed by Plantine at Antwerpe, his highnesse printer.
Joyeuse & magnifique entrée de Monseigneur Francoys fils de France. English.
titleStmt.author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Dawson] for William Ponsonby, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Paules Churchyarde, at the signe of the Bishoppes head,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: La joyeuse & magnifique entrée de Monseigneur Francoys fils de France.
Printer's name and publication date from colophon.
Includes an abstract of Plantin's privilege as Francis's printer--STC.
Running title reads: Mounsiers entertainment into Antwerpe.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Paules Churchyarde, at the signe of the Bishoppes head
